AI.tldr: 本文提出Liquid Interfaces（液态接口）范式，将接口视为运行时通过意图表达与语义协商动态生成的短暂关系事件，而非静态技术契约；并形式化定义Liquid Interface Protocol（LIP），支持意图驱动交互、协商执行及语义不确定性下的短暂性保障。
AI.motivation: 现有软件架构难以支撑具有自适应、概率性和上下文相关推理能力的自主智能体，系统集成仍依赖静态接口和确定性契约，缺乏对动态语义协调的支持。
AI.method: 提出Liquid Interfaces协调范式，形式化建模其行为，并设计Liquid Interface Protocol（LIP）协议；进一步分析治理影响，并构建参考架构验证可行性。
AI.result: 实现了支持意图驱动、语义协商与运行时动态生成接口的协议LIP，并通过参考架构证明该范式在代理系统中具备实践可行性。
AI.conclusion: Liquid Interfaces为基于智能体的自适应协调提供了原理性基础，推动软件架构从静态契约向动态语义协同演进。

title: Heterogeneous Computing: The Key to Powering the Future of AI Agent Inference
summary: AI agent inference is driving an inference heavy datacenter future and exposes bottlenecks beyond compute - especially memory capacity, memory bandwidth and high-speed interconnect. We introduce two metrics - Operational Intensity (OI) and Capacity Footprint (CF) - that jointly explain regimes the classic roofline analysis misses, including the memory capacity wall. Across agentic workflows (chat, coding, web use, computer use) and base model choices (GQA/MLA, MoE, quantization), OI/CF can shift dramatically, with long context KV cache making decode highly memory bound. These observations motivate disaggregated serving and system level heterogeneity: specialized prefill and decode accelerators, broader scale up networking, and decoupled compute-memory enabled by optical I/O. We further hypothesize agent-hardware co design, multiple inference accelerators within one system, and high bandwidth, large capacity memory disaggregation as foundations for adaptation to evolving OI/CF. Together, these directions chart a path to sustain efficiency and capability for large scale agentic AI inference.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Operational Intensity (OI)和Capacity Footprint (CF)两个新指标，用于分析AI智能体推理中的内存容量与带宽瓶颈，指出传统roofline模型的不足，并提出解耦计算与内存、异构加速器协同设计等系统级优化方向。
AI.motivation: AI智能体推理正带来以内存容量、带宽和高速互连为瓶颈的新挑战，传统性能建模（如roofline）无法刻画内存容量墙等问题。
AI.method: 提出OI（操作强度）和CF（容量足迹）两个联合指标，分析多种智能体工作流（聊天、编程、网页/电脑使用）及模型结构（GQA/MLA、MoE、量化）下的性能瓶颈；结合实证观察提出解耦架构、异构加速、光I/O和软硬协同设计等系统方案。
AI.result: 发现长上下文KV缓存使decode阶段高度内存受限；OI/CF在不同工作流与模型配置下变化显著；解耦计算-内存、prefill/decode专用加速器、大规模网络扩展等可提升系统效率。
AI.conclusion: OI/CF指标揭示了AI智能体推理的关键瓶颈；面向OI/CF动态特性的硬件-系统协同设计（如异构加速、大容量高带宽内存解耦）是支撑大规模智能体推理可持续发展的基础路径。

title: CAR-bench: Evaluating the Consistency and Limit-Awareness of LLM Agents under Real-World Uncertainty
summary: Existing benchmarks for Large Language Model (LLM) agents focus on task completion under idealistic settings but overlook reliability in real-world, user-facing applications. In domains, such as in-car voice assistants, users often issue incomplete or ambiguous requests, creating intrinsic uncertainty that agents must manage through dialogue, tool use, and policy adherence. We introduce CAR-bench, a benchmark for evaluating consistency, uncertainty handling, and capability awareness in multi-turn, tool-using LLM agents in an in-car assistant domain. The environment features an LLM-simulated user, domain policies, and 58 interconnected tools spanning navigation, productivity, charging, and vehicle control. Beyond standard task completion, CAR-bench introduces Hallucination tasks that test agents' limit-awareness under missing tools or information, and Disambiguation tasks that require resolving uncertainty through clarification or internal information gathering. Baseline results reveal large gaps between occasional and consistent success on all task types. Even frontier reasoning LLMs achieve less than 50% consistent pass rate on Disambiguation tasks due to premature actions, and frequently violate policies or fabricate information to satisfy user requests in Hallucination tasks, underscoring the need for more reliable and self-aware LLM agents in real-world settings.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了CAR-bench基准，用于评估多轮交互、调用工具的LLM智能体在车载语音助手场景中的一致性、不确定性处理和能力认知能力，揭示了当前前沿模型在歧义消解和幻觉任务中仍存在显著缺陷。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM代理评测基准忽视真实用户场景（如车载语音助手）中请求不完整或模糊带来的内在不确定性，亟需评估其在对话、工具使用与策略遵循方面的可靠性。
AI.method: 构建CAR-bench：基于LLM模拟用户、内置领域策略、58个互连工具（导航/办公/充电/车控），设计两类新任务——Hallucination（测试缺失信息/工具下的边界意识）和Disambiguation（要求通过澄清或内部检索解决歧义）。
AI.result: 前沿推理型LLM在Disambiguation任务上一致通过率<50%，常因过早执行而失败；在Hallucination任务中频繁违反政策或捏造信息，暴露出严重的能力盲区与不可靠性。
AI.conclusion: 当前LLM代理尚缺乏在真实人机协作场景中所需的自知性、一致性与鲁棒性，需发展更可靠的自我认知与不确定性管理机制。

title: Optimizing Agentic Workflows using Meta-tools
summary: Agentic AI enables LLM to dynamically reason, plan, and interact with tools to solve complex tasks. However, agentic workflows often require many iterative reasoning steps and tool invocations, leading to significant operational expense, end-to-end latency and failures due to hallucinations. This work introduces Agent Workflow Optimization (AWO), a framework that identifies and optimizes redundant tool execution patterns to improve the efficiency and robustness of agentic workflows. AWO analyzes existing workflow traces to discover recurring sequences of tool calls and transforms them into meta-tools, which are deterministic, composite tools that bundle multiple agent actions into a single invocation. Meta-tools bypass unnecessary intermediate LLM reasoning steps and reduce operational cost while also shortening execution paths, leading to fewer failures. Experiments on two agentic AI benchmarks show that AWO reduces the number of LLM calls up to 11.9% while also increasing the task success rate by up to 4.2 percent points.

AI.tldr: This paper introduces Agent Workflow Optimization (AWO), a framework that improves agentic AI efficiency and robustness by identifying redundant tool call patterns in workflow traces and bundling them into deterministic meta-tools, reducing LLM calls and increasing success rates.
AI.motivation: Agentic workflows suffer from high operational cost, latency, and failure rates due to many iterative reasoning steps and tool invocations, often exacerbated by hallucinations.
AI.method: AWO analyzes workflow traces to discover recurring sequences of tool calls and transforms them into meta-tools—deterministic, composite tools that encapsulate multiple agent actions into one invocation, bypassing intermediate LLM reasoning.
AI.result: On two agentic AI benchmarks, AWO reduces LLM calls by up to 11.9% and increases task success rate by up to 4.2 percentage points.
AI.conclusion: Meta-tool synthesis via trace analysis is an effective way to enhance the efficiency and reliability of agentic AI systems without modifying the underlying LLM or agent architecture.

title: Defining Operational Conditions for Safety-Critical AI-Based Systems from Data
summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has been on the rise in many domains, including numerous safety-critical applications. However, for complex systems found in the real world, or when data already exist, defining the underlying environmental conditions is extremely challenging. This often results in an incomplete description of the environment in which the AI-based system must operate. Nevertheless, this description, called the Operational Design Domain (ODD), is required in many domains for the certification of AI-based systems. Traditionally, the ODD is created in the early stages of the development process, drawing on sophisticated expert knowledge and related standards. This paper presents a novel Safety-by-Design method to a posteriori define the ODD from previously collected data using a multi-dimensional kernel-based representation. This approach is validated through both Monte Carlo methods and a real-world aviation use case for a future safety-critical collision-avoidance system. Moreover, by defining under what conditions two ODDs are equal, the paper shows that the data-driven ODD can equal the original, underlying hidden ODD of the data. Utilizing the novel, Safe-by-Design kernel-based ODD enables future certification of data-driven, safety-critical AI-based systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于多维核表示的数据驱动方法，用于后验定义人工智能系统运行设计域（ODD），以支持安全关键AI系统的认证。
AI.motivation: 现实世界中复杂系统或已有数据场景下，难以明确定义AI系统运行所需的环境条件（即ODD），而ODD是AI系统认证的必要前提。
AI.method: 提出一种Safety-by-Design方法，利用已收集数据，通过多维核函数表示来后验构建ODD，并借助蒙特卡洛模拟与航空避撞实际用例验证；同时定义了ODD等价性条件。
AI.result: 验证了该数据驱动ODD可等价于数据背后的隐含真实ODD，为数据驱动的安全关键AI系统认证提供了新路径。
AI.conclusion: 该核函数驱动的Safe-by-Design ODD方法有望成为未来安全关键AI系统认证的关键技术支撑。

title: The Patient is not a Moving Document: A World Model Training Paradigm for Longitudinal EHR
summary: Large language models (LLMs) trained with next-word-prediction have achieved success as clinical foundation models. Representations from these language backbones yield strong linear probe performance across biomedical tasks, suggesting that patient semantics emerge from next-token prediction at scale. However, this paradigm treats patients as a document to be summarized rather than a dynamical system to be simulated; a patient's trajectory emerges from their state evolving under interventions and time, requiring models that simulate dynamics rather than predict tokens. To address this, we introduce SMB-Structure, a world model for structured EHR that grounds a joint-embedding prediction architecture (JEPA) with next-token prediction (SFT). SFT grounds our model to reconstruct future patient states in token space, while JEPA predicts those futures in latent space from the initial patient representation alone, forcing trajectory dynamics to be encoded before the next state is observed. We validate across two large-scale cohorts: Memorial Sloan Kettering (23,319 oncology patients; 323,000+ patient-years) and INSPECT (19,402 pulmonary embolism patients). Using a linear probe evaluated at multiple points along the disease trajectory, we demonstrate that our training paradigm learns embeddings that capture disease dynamics not recoverable by autoregressive baselines, enabling SMB-Structure to achieve competitive performance on complex tasks characterized by high patient heterogeneity. Model weights are available at https://huggingface.co/standardmodelbio/SMB-v1-1.7B-Structure.

AI.tldr: 本文提出SMB-Structure，一种结合JEPA与监督微调（SFT）的世界模型，用于建模电子健康记录（EHR）中的患者动态轨迹，超越传统仅依赖下一词预测的LLM范式。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM将患者视为静态文档进行总结，忽略了其作为受干预和时间影响的动态系统本质；需能模拟疾病演化的模型而非仅预测token。
AI.method: 提出SMB-Structure：以JEPA架构在潜在空间中仅基于初始表征预测未来状态，同时用SFT（下一token预测）在token空间重建未来状态，二者联合训练以强制编码动态轨迹。
AI.result: 在MSK与INSPECT两大真实临床队列上验证，线性探针显示其嵌入能捕获自回归基线无法恢复的疾病动态，在高异质性临床任务中达到有竞争力性能。
AI.conclusion: 将世界模型思想引入临床AI，通过联合JEPA与SFT训练范式，可更有效地从EHR中学习患者状态演化规律，为动态临床推理奠定基础。

title: World of Workflows: a Benchmark for Bringing World Models to Enterprise Systems
summary: Frontier large language models (LLMs) excel as autonomous agents in many domains, yet they remain untested in complex enterprise systems where hidden workflows create cascading effects across interconnected databases. Existing enterprise benchmarks evaluate surface-level agentic task completion similar to general consumer benchmarks, ignoring true challenges in enterprises, such as limited observability, large database state, and hidden workflows with cascading side effects. We introduce World of Workflows (WoW), a realistic ServiceNow-based environment incorporating 4,000+ business rules and 55 active workflows embedded in the system, alongside WoW-bench, a benchmark of 234 tasks evaluating constrained agentic task completion and enterprise dynamics modeling capabilities. We reveal two major takeaways: (1) Frontier LLMs suffer from dynamics blindness, consistently failing to predict the invisible, cascading side effects of their actions, which leads to silent constraint violations, and (2) reliability in opaque systems requires grounded world modeling, where agents must mentally simulate hidden state transitions to bridge the observability gap when high-fidelity feedback is unavailable. For reliable and useful enterprise agents, WoW motivates a new paradigm to explicitly learn system dynamics. We release our GitHub for setting up and evaluating WoW.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了World of Workflows (WoW)——一个基于ServiceNow的真实企业环境及配套基准WoW-bench，用于评估大语言模型在复杂企业系统中的动态建模与自主代理能力；研究发现前沿LLM存在‘动态盲区’，难以预测隐藏工作流的级联副作用，强调需通过具身化世界建模来弥补可观测性缺口。
AI.motivation: 现有企业基准仅评估表层任务完成能力，忽视企业系统中因低可观测性、大规模数据库状态和隐藏工作流引发的级联效应等真实挑战。
AI.method: 构建基于ServiceNow的WoW环境（含4000+业务规则、55个活跃工作流）及WoW-bench基准（234个任务），系统评测LLM在约束性任务完成与企业动态建模两方面的能力。
AI.result: 发现前沿LLM普遍存在‘动态盲区’，无法预测动作引发的隐藏级联副作用，导致静默约束违反；验证了以具身化世界建模提升低反馈环境下可靠性的必要性。
AI.conclusion: 面向企业场景的可靠智能体需从单纯任务驱动转向显式学习系统动态，WoW为该新范式提供了基础环境与评估标准。

title: Rethinking LLM-Driven Heuristic Design: Generating Efficient and Specialized Solvers via Dynamics-Aware Optimization
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) have advanced the field of Combinatorial Optimization through automated heuristic generation. Instead of relying on manual design, this LLM-Driven Heuristic Design (LHD) process leverages LLMs to iteratively generate and refine solvers to achieve high performance. However, existing LHD frameworks face two critical limitations: (1) Endpoint-only evaluation, which ranks solvers solely by final quality, ignoring the convergence process and runtime efficiency; (2) High adaptation costs, where distribution shifts necessitate re-adaptation to generate specialized solvers for new instance groups. To address these issues, we propose Dynamics-Aware Solver Heuristics (DASH), a framework that co-optimizes solver search mechanisms and runtime schedules guided by a convergence-aware metric, thereby identifying efficient and high-performance solvers. Furthermore, to mitigate expensive re-adaptation, DASH incorporates Profiled Library Retrieval (PLR). PLR efficiently archives specialized solvers concurrently with the evolutionary process, enabling cost-effective warm-starts for heterogeneous distributions. Experiments on four combinatorial optimization problems demonstrate that DASH improves runtime efficiency by over 3 times, while surpassing the solution quality of state-of-the-art baselines across diverse problem scales. Furthermore, by enabling profile-based warm starts, DASH maintains superior accuracy under different distributions while cutting LLM adaptation costs by over 90%.

AI.tldr: 本文提出DASH框架，通过动态感知的求解器启发式设计和配置文件库检索（PLR），在组合优化问题中显著提升运行效率与解质量，并大幅降低大语言模型适应成本。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM驱动的启发式设计（LHD）框架存在终点评估单一、忽略收敛过程与运行效率，以及分布偏移时适应成本过高的问题。
AI.method: 提出Dynamics-Aware Solver Heuristics（DASH）框架，联合优化求解器搜索机制与运行调度策略，并引入Profiled Library Retrieval（PLR）机制，在进化过程中同步归档专用求解器以支持异构分布下的高效热启动。
AI.result: 在四个组合优化问题上，DASH将运行效率提升3倍以上，解质量超越现有最优基线；同时降低90%以上的LLM适应成本，并在不同分布下保持高精度。
AI.conclusion: DASH通过融合动态收敛感知与可复用求解器库，有效解决了LHD方法在效率、泛化性与适应成本方面的关键瓶颈，为LLM驱动的组合优化提供了更实用、可扩展的新范式。

title: Finetune-Informed Pretraining Boosts Downstream Performance
summary: Multimodal pretraining is effective for building general-purpose representations, but in many practical deployments, only one modality is heavily used during downstream fine-tuning. Standard pretraining strategies treat all modalities uniformly, which can lead to under-optimized representations for the modality that actually matters. We propose Finetune-Informed Pretraining (FIP), a model-agnostic method that biases representation learning toward a designated target modality needed at fine-tuning time. FIP combines higher masking difficulty, stronger loss weighting, and increased decoder capacity for the target modality, without modifying the shared encoder or requiring additional supervision. When applied to masked modeling on constellation diagrams for wireless signals, FIP consistently improves downstream fine-tuned performance with no extra data or compute. FIP is simple to implement, architecture-compatible, and broadly applicable across multimodal masked modeling pipelines.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Finetune-Informed Pretraining (FIP) 的模型无关预训练方法，旨在通过增强目标模态的掩码难度、损失权重和解码器容量，使多模态预训练更偏向下游微调中实际使用的关键模态，从而提升性能。
AI.motivation: 标准多模态预训练对所有模态一视同仁，但在实际部署中往往只重点使用一种模态，导致该模态表征未被充分优化。
AI.method: FIP在不修改共享编码器、不增加监督信号的前提下，针对目标模态采用更高掩码难度、更强损失加权和更大解码器容量。
AI.result: 在无线信号星座图的掩码建模任务上，FIP持续提升了下游微调性能，且无需额外数据或计算开销。
AI.conclusion: FIP是一种简单、兼容性强、可广泛应用于多模态掩码建模流程的预训练优化方法。

title: The Depth Delusion: Why Transformers Should Be Wider, Not Deeper
summary: Neural scaling laws describe how language model loss decreases with parameters and data, but treat architecture as interchangeable--a billion parameters could arise from a shallow-wide model (10 layers & 8,192 hidden dimension) or a deep-narrow one (80 layers & 2,048 hidden dimension). We propose architecture-conditioned scaling laws decomposing this dependence, finding that optimal depth scales as D* ~ C^0.12 while optimal width scales as W* ~ C^0.34, meaning width should grow 2.8x faster than depth. We discover a critical depth phenomenon: beyond D_crit ~ W^0.44 (sublinear in W), adding layers increases loss despite adding parameters--the Depth Delusion. Empirically, we validate these findings across 30 transformer architectures spanning 17M to 7B parameters, each trained on representative high-compute samples, achieving R^2 = 0.922. Our central finding: at 7B scale, a 64-layer model (6.38B params) underperforms a 32-layer model (6.86B params) by 0.12 nats, despite being significantly deeper. This demonstrates that optimal depth-width tradeoffs persist at the production scale.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了架构条件下的神经缩放定律，揭示了在参数总量固定时，模型宽度应比深度增长更快（2.8倍），并发现存在一个临界深度：超过该深度后继续增加层数反而会损害性能（'深度幻觉'），该结论在17M至7B参数的30种Transformer架构上得到验证。
AI.motivation: 现有神经缩放定律将模型架构视为可互换，忽略深度与宽度对性能的差异化影响，无法指导最优架构设计。
AI.method: 提出架构条件缩放律，理论推导最优深度D* ~ C^0.12和最优宽度W* ~ C^0.34，并识别临界深度D_crit ~ W^0.44；在30种Transformer架构（17M–7B参数）上进行高算力训练与实证分析。
AI.result: 验证了宽度增长快于深度的规律（2.8×），发现并命名'深度幻觉'现象；在7B规模下，64层模型（6.38B参数）性能反低于32层模型（6.86B参数），损失高出0.12 nats；整体拟合R² = 0.922。
AI.conclusion: 模型深度与宽度不可简单互换；存在架构依赖的最优缩放关系，且该关系在大规模生产模型中依然成立，对高效大模型设计具有直接指导意义。

title: Solver-in-the-Loop: MDP-Based Benchmarks for Self-Correction and Behavioral Rationality in Operations Research
summary: Operations Research practitioners routinely debug infeasible models through an iterative process: analyzing Irreducible Infeasible Subsystems (\IIS{}), identifying constraint conflicts, and systematically repairing formulations until feasibility is achieved. Yet existing LLM benchmarks evaluate OR as one-shot translation -- given a problem description, generate solver code -- ignoring this diagnostic loop entirely. We introduce two benchmarks that place the \textbf{solver in the evaluation loop}. \textbf{\ORDebug{}} evaluates iterative self-correction through 5,000+ problems spanning 9 error types; each repair action triggers solver re-execution and \IIS{} recomputation, providing deterministic, verifiable feedback. \textbf{\ORBias{}} evaluates behavioral rationality through 2,000 newsvendor instances (1,000 ID + 1,000 OOD), measuring systematic deviations from closed-form optimal policies. Across 26 models and 12,000+ samples, we find that domain-specific RLVR training enables an 8B model to surpass frontier APIs: 95.3\% vs 86.2\% recovery rate (+9.1\%), 62.4\% vs 47.8\% diagnostic accuracy (+14.6\%), and 2.25 vs 3.78 steps to resolution (1.7$\times$ faster). On \ORBias{}, curriculum training achieves the only negative ID$\rightarrow$OOD bias drift among models evaluated (-9.6\%), reducing systematic bias by 48\% (from 20.0\% to 10.4\%). These results demonstrate that process-level evaluation with verifiable oracles enables targeted training that outperforms scale.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了两个新的运筹学（OR）基准测试ORDebug和ORBias，强调将求解器纳入评估循环，以评估模型在调试不可行模型和行为理性方面的表现。实验表明，领域特定的强化学习训练可显著提升小规模模型（8B）在修复率、诊断准确率和解决速度上的性能，超越了前沿API；同时，课程学习能有效减少系统性偏差。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM基准仅评估运筹学问题的一次性代码生成能力，忽略了实际中反复调试不可行模型这一核心工作流，缺乏对诊断与修复过程的评估。
AI.method: 构建两个新基准：ORDebug（含5000+多错误类型问题，每次修复后调用求解器并重新计算IIS以提供确定性反馈）和ORBias（2000个报童问题，评估模型偏离最优策略的系统性偏差）；采用领域定制的RLVR训练和课程学习策略，在26个模型上进行大规模评估。
AI.result: 8B模型经RLVR训练后，在ORDebug上修复率达95.3%（+9.1%）、诊断准确率62.4%（+14.6%）、解决步数减少1.7倍；在ORBias上实现ID→OOD负向偏移（-9.6%），系统性偏差降低48%。
AI.conclusion: 引入可验证oracle的过程级评估范式，配合针对性训练，可使中小规模模型在运筹学任务中显著超越更大规模通用模型，证明‘方法优于规模’。

title: Conditional Denoising Model as a Physical Surrogate Model
summary: Surrogate modeling for complex physical systems typically faces a trade-off between data-fitting accuracy and physical consistency. Physics-consistent approaches typically treat physical laws as soft constraints within the loss function, a strategy that frequently fails to guarantee strict adherence to the governing equations, or rely on post-processing corrections that do not intrinsically learn the underlying solution geometry. To address these limitations, we introduce the {Conditional Denoising Model (CDM)}, a generative model designed to learn the geometry of the physical manifold itself. By training the network to restore clean states from noisy ones, the model learns a vector field that points continuously towards the valid solution subspace. We introduce a time-independent formulation that transforms inference into a deterministic fixed-point iteration, effectively projecting noisy approximations onto the equilibrium manifold. Validated on a low-temperature plasma physics and chemistry benchmark, the CDM achieves higher parameter and data efficiency than physics-consistent baselines. Crucially, we demonstrate that the denoising objective acts as a powerful implicit regularizer: despite never seeing the governing equations during training, the model adheres to physical constraints more strictly than baselines trained with explicit physics losses.

AI.tldr: 本文提出条件去噪模型（CDM），通过学习物理流形几何结构，以去噪方式隐式满足物理约束，无需显式引入物理方程，在等离子体基准测试中展现出更高参数与数据效率及更强物理一致性。
AI.motivation: 现有物理一致的代理建模方法难以严格满足控制方程：软约束易失效，后处理无法内化解的几何结构。
AI.method: 提出条件去噪模型（CDM），训练网络从加噪状态恢复干净状态，学习指向有效解子空间的向量场；采用时不变公式，将推理转化为确定性不动点迭代，实现向平衡流形的投影。
AI.result: 在低温等离子体物理与化学基准上，CDM比物理一致基线方法具有更高的参数和数据效率；即使训练中未接触控制方程，其物理约束满足度仍优于使用显式物理损失训练的基线。
AI.conclusion: 去噪目标可作为强隐式正则器，使模型无需显式物理监督即可内化并严格遵循物理规律，为物理驱动建模提供了新范式。

title: SIGMA-PPG: Statistical-prior Informed Generative Masking Architecture for PPG Foundation Model
summary: Current foundation model for photoplethysmography (PPG) signals is challenged by the intrinsic redundancy and noise of the signal. Standard masked modeling often yields trivial solutions while contrastive methods lack morphological precision. To address these limitations, we propose a Statistical-prior Informed Generative Masking Architecture (SIGMA-PPG), a generative foundation model featuring a Prior-Guided Adversarial Masking mechanism, where a reinforcement learning-driven teacher leverages statistical priors to create challenging learning paths that prevent overfitting to noise. We also incorporate a semantic consistency constraint via vector quantization to ensure that physiologically identical waveforms (even those altered by recording artifacts or minor perturbations) map to shared indices. This enhances codebook semantic density and eliminates redundant feature structures. Pre-trained on over 120,000 hours of data, SIGMA-PPG achieves superior average performance compared to five state-of-the-art baselines across 12 diverse downstream tasks. The code is available at https://github.com/ZonghengGuo/SigmaPPG.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为SIGMA-PPG的生成式基础模型，通过统计先验引导的对抗掩码机制和语义一致性约束（向量量化），有效应对PPG信号冗余与噪声问题，在12个下游任务中性能优于5种SOTA方法。
AI.motivation: 现有PPG信号基础模型受限于信号固有的冗余性和噪声；标准掩码建模易得平凡解，对比学习缺乏形态学精度。
AI.method: 提出统计先验引导的生成式掩码架构（SIGMA-PPG），包含强化学习驱动的先验引导对抗掩码机制和基于向量量化的语义一致性约束，以提升生理波形映射的鲁棒性与代码本语义密度。
AI.result: 在超12万小时PPG数据上预训练后，SIGMA-PPG在12个下游任务中平均性能优于5种前沿基线方法。
AI.conclusion: SIGMA-PPG通过融合统计先验、对抗掩码与语义量化，显著提升了PPG基础模型的表征能力与泛化性，为生理信号建模提供了新范式。

title: SMKC: Sketch Based Kernel Correlation Images for Variable Cardinality Time Series Anomaly Detection
summary: Conventional anomaly detection in multivariate time series relies on the assumption that the set of observed variables remains static. In operational environments, however, monitoring systems frequently experience sensor churn. Signals may appear, disappear, or be renamed, creating data windows where the cardinality varies and may include values unseen during training. To address this challenge, we propose SMKC, a framework that decouples the dynamic input structure from the anomaly detector. We first employ permutation-invariant feature hashing to sketch raw inputs into a fixed size state sequence. We then construct a hybrid kernel image to capture global temporal structure through pairwise comparisons of the sequence and its derivatives. The model learns normal patterns using masked reconstruction and a teacher-student prediction objective. Our evaluation reveals that robust log-distance channels provide the primary discriminative signal, whereas cosine representations often fail to capture sufficient contrast. Notably, we find that a detector using random projections and nearest neighbors on the SMKC representation performs competitively with fully trained baselines without requiring gradient updates. This highlights the effectiveness of the representation itself and offers a practical cold-start solution for resource-constrained deployments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出SMKC框架，通过特征哈希和混合核图像处理传感器动态变化的多变量时间序列异常检测问题，无需梯度更新即可实现高效检测。
AI.motivation: 传统多变量时间序列异常检测假设观测变量集合静态不变，但实际监控系统中传感器常发生增删改（sensor churn），导致输入维度动态变化且存在训练未见值，现有方法难以应对。
AI.method: 提出SMKC框架：1）使用排列不变的特征哈希将原始可变长输入映射为固定长度状态序列；2）构建混合核图像以捕获序列及其导数的全局时序结构；3）采用掩码重建与师生预测目标学习正常模式。
AI.result: 实验表明鲁棒对数距离通道提供主要判别信号，余弦表示效果较差；基于SMKC表征的随机投影+近邻检测器无需梯度更新即能媲美全训练基线。
AI.conclusion: SMKC成功解耦动态输入结构与检测器，其表征本身具有强判别力，支持无训练冷启动部署，适用于资源受限场景。

title: Textual Equilibrium Propagation for Deep Compound AI Systems
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are increasingly deployed as part of compound AI systems that coordinate multiple modules (e.g., retrievers, tools, verifiers) over long-horizon workflows. Recent approaches that propagate textual feedback globally (e.g., TextGrad) make it feasible to optimize such pipelines, but we find that performance degrades as system depth grows. In particular, long-horizon agentic workflows exhibit two depth-scaling failure modes: 1) exploding textual gradient, where textual feedback grows exponentially with depth, leading to prohibitively long message and amplifies evaluation biases; and 2) vanishing textual gradient, where limited long-context ability causes models overemphasize partial feedback and compression of lengthy feedback causes downstream messages to lose specificity gradually as they propagate many hops upstream. To mitigate these issues, we introduce Textual Equilibrium Propagation (TEP), a local learning principle inspired by Equilibrium Propagation in energy-based models. TEP includes two phases: 1) a free phase where a local LLM critics iteratively refine prompts until reaching equilibrium (no further improvements are suggested); and 2) a nudged phase which applies proximal prompt edits with bounded modification intensity, using task-level objectives that propagate via forward signaling rather than backward feedback chains. This design supports local prompt optimization followed by controlled adaptation toward global goals without the computational burden and signal degradation of global textual backpropagation. Across long-horizon QA benchmarks and multi-agent tool-use dataset, TEP consistently improves accuracy and efficiency over global propagation methods such as TextGrad. The gains grows with depth, while preserving the practicality of black-box LLM components in deep compound AI system.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Textual Equilibrium Propagation（TEP），一种受能量模型中平衡传播启发的局部学习方法，用于优化深度复合AI系统中的长程工作流，缓解全局文本反馈传播导致的梯度爆炸与消失问题。
AI.motivation: 现有基于全局文本反馈传播的方法（如TextGrad）在系统深度增加时性能显著下降，存在文本梯度爆炸和消失两大深度扩展失效模式。
AI.method: 提出Textual Equilibrium Propagation（TEP），包含自由相（本地LLM批评者迭代优化提示至平衡态）和扰动相（以有界强度进行邻近提示编辑，通过前向信号而非反向链式反馈传播任务目标）。
AI.result: 在长程问答基准和多智能体工具使用数据集上，TEP相比TextGrad等全局传播方法持续提升准确率与效率，且增益随系统深度增长，同时保持黑盒LLM组件的实用性。
AI.conclusion: TEP通过局部优化与受控适应机制，有效克服了深度复合AI系统中全局文本反向传播的计算开销与信号衰减问题，为可扩展的端到端提示优化提供了新范式。

title: LOCUS: Low-Dimensional Model Embeddings for Efficient Model Exploration, Comparison, and Selection
summary: The rapidly growing ecosystem of Large Language Models (LLMs) makes it increasingly challenging to manage and utilize the vast and dynamic pool of models effectively. We propose LOCUS, a method that produces low-dimensional vector embeddings that compactly represent a language model's capabilities across queries. LOCUS is an attention-based approach that generates embeddings by a deterministic forward pass over query encodings and evaluation scores via an encoder model, enabling seamless incorporation of new models to the pool and refinement of existing model embeddings without having to perform any retraining. We additionally train a correctness predictor that uses model embeddings and query encodings to achieve state-of-the-art routing accuracy on unseen queries. Experiments show that LOCUS needs up to 4.8x fewer query evaluation samples than baselines to produce informative and robust embeddings. Moreover, the learned embedding space is geometrically meaningful: proximity reflects model similarity, enabling a range of downstream applications including model comparison and clustering, model portfolio selection, and resilient proxies of unavailable models.

AI.tldr: LOCUS是一种无需重训练即可生成语言模型能力低维嵌入的方法，并能结合查询编码预测模型正确性，实现高效模型路由与下游应用。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLMs）生态迅速扩张，导致模型池庞大且动态变化，亟需一种高效、可扩展的模型能力表征与管理方法。
AI.method: LOCUS采用基于注意力机制的编码器，通过确定性前向传播将查询编码和评估分数映射为低维模型嵌入；同时训练一个基于嵌入与查询编码的正确性预测器用于路由。
AI.result: LOCUS在嵌入生成中比基线方法最多减少4.8倍的查询评估样本量；其嵌入空间具有几何意义（邻近即相似），支持模型比较、聚类、组合选择及失效模型代理等下游任务；路由准确率达SOTA。
AI.conclusion: LOCUS提供了一种轻量、可扩展、无需重训练的模型能力表征框架，显著提升模型池管理效率与灵活性，并拓展了嵌入空间的语义与实用价值。

title: Safety Generalization Under Distribution Shift in Safe Reinforcement Learning: A Diabetes Testbed
summary: Safe Reinforcement Learning (RL) algorithms are typically evaluated under fixed training conditions. We investigate whether training-time safety guarantees transfer to deployment under distribution shift, using diabetes management as a safety-critical testbed. We benchmark safe RL algorithms on a unified clinical simulator and reveal a safety generalization gap: policies satisfying constraints during training frequently violate safety requirements on unseen patients. We demonstrate that test-time shielding, which filters unsafe actions using learned dynamics models, effectively restores safety across algorithms and patient populations. Across eight safe RL algorithms, three diabetes types, and three age groups, shielding achieves Time-in-Range gains of 13--14\% for strong baselines such as PPO-Lag and CPO while reducing clinical risk index and glucose variability. Our simulator and benchmark provide a platform for studying safety under distribution shift in safety-critical control domains. Code is available at https://github.com/safe-autonomy-lab/GlucoSim and https://github.com/safe-autonomy-lab/GlucoAlg.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了安全强化学习算法在糖尿病管理中的部署安全性，发现训练时的安全保证在分布偏移下难以泛化，提出测试时屏蔽机制有效恢复安全性，并在多种算法和患者群体上验证了其有效性。
AI.motivation: 安全强化学习算法通常在固定训练条件下评估，但其在实际部署中面对分布偏移（如不同患者）时的安全性泛化能力尚不明确，亟需在真实安全关键场景中检验。
AI.method: 在统一临床模拟器GlucoSim上对八种安全RL算法进行基准测试，分析其在不同糖尿病类型与年龄组患者上的安全泛化能力；引入基于学习动力学模型的测试时动作屏蔽机制以恢复安全性。
AI.result: 发现显著的安全泛化差距：训练中满足约束的策略在未见患者上频繁违反安全要求；测试时屏蔽机制使PPO-Lag、CPO等强基线算法Time-in-Range提升13–14%，同时降低临床风险指数和血糖变异性。
AI.conclusion: 训练时的安全性不能自然泛化至分布偏移下的部署场景，而测试时屏蔽是一种通用且有效的安全增强手段，为安全关键控制任务提供了可扩展的保障框架。

title: Mobility-Embedded POIs: Learning What A Place Is and How It Is Used from Human Movement
summary: Recent progress in geospatial foundation models highlights the importance of learning general-purpose representations for real-world locations, particularly points-of-interest (POIs) where human activity concentrates. Existing approaches, however, focus primarily on place identity derived from static textual metadata, or learn representations tied to trajectory context, which capture movement regularities rather than how places are actually used (i.e., POI's function). We argue that POI function is a missing but essential signal for general POI representations. We introduce Mobility-Embedded POIs (ME-POIs), a framework that augments POI embeddings derived, from language models with large-scale human mobility data to learn POI-centric, context-independent representations grounded in real-world usage. ME-POIs encodes individual visits as temporally contextualized embeddings and aligns them with learnable POI representations via contrastive learning to capture usage patterns across users and time. To address long-tail sparsity, we propose a novel mechanism that propagates temporal visit patterns from nearby, frequently visited POIs across multiple spatial scales. We evaluate ME-POIs on five newly proposed map enrichment tasks, testing its ability to capture both the identity and function of POIs. Across all tasks, augmenting text-based embeddings with ME-POIs consistently outperforms both text-only and mobility-only baselines. Notably, ME-POIs trained on mobility data alone can surpass text-only models on certain tasks, highlighting that POI function is a critical component of accurate and generalizable POI representations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出ME-POIs框架，通过融合语言模型的POI文本嵌入与大规模人类移动数据，学习以POI功能为核心的、上下文无关的通用表征，并在多项地图增强任务中验证其有效性。
AI.motivation: 现有POI表征方法主要依赖静态文本元数据或轨迹上下文，忽略了反映真实使用方式的POI功能这一关键信号。
AI.method: 提出ME-POIs框架：将单次访问建模为时序上下文化嵌入，通过对比学习对齐到可学习的POI表征；并设计多尺度空间邻近POI间的时间访问模式传播机制以缓解长尾稀疏问题。
AI.result: 在五个新提出的地图增强任务上，ME-POIs显著优于纯文本和纯移动基线；仅用移动数据训练的ME-POIs在部分任务上甚至超越纯文本模型。
AI.conclusion: POI功能是构建准确、通用POI表征不可或缺的核心要素，ME-POIs成功将其融入表征学习过程。

title: Can Neural Networks Learn Small Algebraic Worlds? An Investigation Into the Group-theoretic Structures Learned By Narrow Models Trained To Predict Group Operations
summary: While a real-world research program in mathematics may be guided by a motivating question, the process of mathematical discovery is typically open-ended. Ideally, exploration needed to answer the original question will reveal new structures, patterns, and insights that are valuable in their own right. This contrasts with the exam-style paradigm in which the machine learning community typically applies AI to math. To maximize progress in mathematics using AI, we will need to go beyond simple question answering. With this in mind, we explore the extent to which narrow models trained to solve a fixed mathematical task learn broader mathematical structure that can be extracted by a researcher or other AI system. As a basic test case for this, we use the task of training a neural network to predict a group operation (for example, performing modular arithmetic or composition of permutations). We describe a suite of tests designed to assess whether the model captures significant group-theoretic notions such as the identity element, commutativity, or subgroups. Through extensive experimentation we find evidence that models learn representations capable of capturing abstract algebraic properties. For example, we find hints that models capture the commutativity of modular arithmetic. We are also able to train linear classifiers that reliably distinguish between elements of certain subgroups (even though no labels for these subgroups are included in the data). On the other hand, we are unable to extract notions such as the concept of the identity element. Together, our results suggest that in some cases the representations of even small neural networks can be used to distill interesting abstract structure from new mathematical objects.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了AI在数学研究中的应用，超越了传统的问答式范式，通过训练神经网络预测群运算（如模运算或置换组合），检验模型是否能学习到抽象代数结构（如交换性、子群等），实验表明小规模神经网络确实能捕捉部分抽象数学性质，但尚不能提取如单位元等概念。
AI.motivation: 现有AI在数学中的应用多局限于考试式问答，而真实数学研究是开放式的、以探索新结构和模式为导向；本文旨在探索AI模型能否在完成特定数学任务时，自发学习并表征更广泛的数学结构。
AI.method: 以群运算预测（如模运算、置换合成）为任务，训练窄域神经网络，并设计一系列测试来评估模型是否隐含学习到群论概念（如单位元、交换性、子群）；通过线性分类器、表示空间分析等手段检验模型内部表征。
AI.result: 实验发现模型能捕捉某些抽象代数性质，例如模运算的交换性；可训练线性分类器区分特定子群元素（无子群标签监督）；但无法可靠提取单位元等基本概念。
AI.conclusion: 即使小型神经网络的表征也蕴含可被提取的有趣抽象数学结构，表明AI有望辅助数学发现，但当前能力仍有限，需进一步研究如何引导模型学习更深层的数学本质。

title: AC2L-GAD: Active Counterfactual Contrastive Learning for Graph Anomaly Detection
summary: Graph anomaly detection aims to identify abnormal patterns in networks, but faces significant challenges from label scarcity and extreme class imbalance. While graph contrastive learning offers a promising unsupervised solution, existing methods suffer from two critical limitations: random augmentations break semantic consistency in positive pairs, while naive negative sampling produces trivial, uninformative contrasts. We propose AC2L-GAD, an Active Counterfactual Contrastive Learning framework that addresses both limitations through principled counterfactual reasoning. By combining information-theoretic active selection with counterfactual generation, our approach identifies structurally complex nodes and generates anomaly-preserving positive augmentations alongside normal negative counterparts that provide hard contrasts, while restricting expensive counterfactual generation to a strategically selected subset. This design reduces computational overhead by approximately 65% compared to full-graph counterfactual generation while maintaining detection quality. Experiments on nine benchmark datasets, including real-world financial transaction graphs from GADBench, show that AC2L-GAD achieves competitive or superior performance compared to state-of-the-art baselines, with notable gains in datasets where anomalies exhibit complex attribute-structure interactions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出AC2L-GAD框架，通过主动反事实对比学习解决图异常检测中标签稀缺与类别极度不平衡问题，兼顾语义一致性与难负样本构建，显著降低计算开销并提升检测性能。
AI.motivation: 图异常检测面临标签稀缺和极端类别不平衡的挑战，而现有图对比学习方法存在正样本语义不一致和负样本信息量不足的问题。
AI.method: 提出AC2L-GAD框架，结合信息论驱动的主动选择与反事实生成：主动识别结构复杂节点，生成保持异常特性的正增强样本和具有判别力的正常负样本，并仅对精选子集执行高成本反事实生成。
AI.result: 在九个基准数据集（含GADBench真实金融交易图）上实验表明，AC2L-GAD性能优于或媲美现有SOTA方法，尤其在属性-结构交互复杂的异常上提升显著；计算开销比全图反事实生成降低约65%。
AI.conclusion: AC2L-GAD通过引入主动反事实对比机制，在保证检测质量的同时大幅降低计算成本，为无监督图异常检测提供了更高效、鲁棒的新范式。

title: Rethinking Refinement: Correcting Generative Bias without Noise Injection
summary: Generative models, including diffusion and flow-based models, often exhibit systematic biases that degrade sample quality, particularly in high-dimensional settings. We revisit refinement methods and show that effective bias correction can be achieved as a post-hoc procedure, without noise injection or multi-step resampling of the sampling process. We propose a flow-matching-based \textbf{Bi-stage Flow Refinement (BFR)} framework with two refinement strategies operating at different stages: latent space alignment for approximately invertible generators and data space refinement trained with lightweight augmentations. Unlike previous refiners that perturb sampling dynamics, BFR preserves the original ODE trajectory and applies deterministic corrections to generated samples. Experiments on MNIST, CIFAR-10, and FFHQ at 256x256 resolution demonstrate consistent improvements in fidelity and coverage; notably, starting from base samples with FID 3.95, latent space refinement achieves a \textbf{state-of-the-art} FID of \textbf{1.46} on MNIST using only a single additional function evaluation (1-NFE), while maintaining sample diversity.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种无需噪声注入或多步重采样的后处理式偏差校正框架Bi-stage Flow Refinement（BFR），通过潜空间对齐和数据空间增强两种策略，在保持原始ODE轨迹的前提下提升生成样本质量。
AI.motivation: 生成模型（如扩散模型和流模型）在高维场景下常存在系统性偏差，导致样本质量下降，亟需有效且高效的后处理校正方法。
AI.method: 提出基于流匹配的两阶段流精炼（BFR）框架：第一阶段为潜空间对齐（适用于近似可逆生成器），第二阶段为带轻量增强的数据空间精炼；所有修正均为确定性、单步、不扰动原ODE轨迹。
AI.result: 在MNIST、CIFAR-10和256×256 FFHQ上验证了FID与覆盖率的一致提升；MNIST上从FID 3.95提升至1.46（SOTA），仅需1次额外函数评估（1-NFE）且保持多样性。
AI.conclusion: BFR证明了简单、确定性、低开销的后处理精炼能显著缓解生成模型偏差，为高效高质量生成提供了新范式。

title: A Sheaf-Theoretic and Topological Perspective on Complex Network Modeling and Attention Mechanisms in Graph Neural Models
summary: Combinatorial and topological structures, such as graphs, simplicial complexes, and cell complexes, form the foundation of geometric and topological deep learning (GDL and TDL) architectures. These models aggregate signals over such domains, integrate local features, and generate representations for diverse real-world applications. However, the distribution and diffusion behavior of GDL and TDL features during training remains an open and underexplored problem. Motivated by this gap, we introduce a cellular sheaf theoretic framework for modeling and analyzing the local consistency and harmonicity of node features and edge weights in graph-based architectures. By tracking local feature alignments and agreements through sheaf structures, the framework offers a topological perspective on feature diffusion and aggregation. Furthermore, a multiscale extension inspired by topological data analysis (TDA) is proposed to capture hierarchical feature interactions in graph models. This approach enables a joint characterization of GDL and TDL architectures based on their underlying geometric and topological structures and the learned signals defined on them, providing insights for future studies on conventional tasks such as node classification, substructure detection, and community detection.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于细胞层论（cellular sheaf theory）的框架，用于建模和分析图神经网络中节点特征与边权重的局部一致性与调和性，并结合TDA思想扩展为多尺度方法，以刻画几何/拓扑深度学习模型中结构与信号的联合特性。
AI.motivation: 现有几何与拓扑深度学习（GDL/TDL）模型中，特征在训练过程中的分布与扩散行为尚缺乏系统分析，这一基础问题亟待探索。
AI.method: 引入细胞层论建模图结构上的局部特征对齐与一致性；结合拓扑数据分析（TDA）思想，构建多尺度扩展以捕获图模型中的层次化特征交互。
AI.result: 实现了对GDL/TDL架构的联合表征——既涵盖其底层几何/拓扑结构，也包含定义其上的学习信号；为节点分类、子结构检测、社区发现等任务提供新的理论洞察。
AI.conclusion: 细胞层论为理解GDL/TDL中特征传播与聚合提供了统一的拓扑视角，多尺度扩展增强了对层级特征关系的刻画能力，推动了该方向的理论深化与可解释性研究。

title: Temporal Context and Architecture: A Benchmark for Naturalistic EEG Decoding
summary: We study how model architecture and temporal context interact in naturalistic EEG decoding. Using the HBN movie-watching dataset, we benchmark five architectures, CNN, LSTM, a stabilized Transformer (EEGXF), S4, and S5, on a 4-class task across segment lengths from 8s to 128s. Accuracy improves with longer context: at 64s, S5 reaches 98.7%+/-0.6 and CNN 98.3%+/-0.3, while S5 uses ~20x fewer parameters than CNN. To probe real-world robustness, we evaluate zero-shot cross-frequency shifts, cross-task OOD inputs, and leave-one-subject-out generalization. S5 achieves stronger cross-subject accuracy but makes over-confident errors on OOD tasks; EEGXF is more conservative and stable under frequency shifts, though less calibrated in-distribution. These results reveal a practical efficiency-robustness trade-off: S5 for parameter-efficient peak accuracy; EEGXF when robustness and conservative uncertainty are critical.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了模型架构与时间上下文在自然化EEG解码中的相互作用，比较了CNN、LSTM、EEGXF、S4和S5五种模型在不同时间长度下的性能，并分析了它们在鲁棒性、参数效率和不确定性校准方面的权衡。
AI.motivation: 探究不同模型架构与时间上下文长度对自然化EEG解码性能的影响，并评估其在真实场景（如跨被试、跨频率、分布外任务）下的鲁棒性。
AI.method: 在HBN电影观看数据集上，对CNN、LSTM、EEGXF、S4和S5五种模型进行基准测试，任务为4分类，段长从8秒到128秒；并开展零样本跨频率迁移、跨任务OOD测试和留一被试泛化实验。
AI.result: S5在64秒段长下达到98.7%±0.6准确率，参数量仅为CNN的约1/20；S5跨被试泛化更强但OOD下过于自信；EEGXF在频率偏移下更稳健且保守，但分布内校准较差。
AI.conclusion: 存在实际的效率-鲁棒性权衡：S5适合追求高精度与低参数量的场景；EEGXF更适合强调鲁棒性和保守不确定性估计的应用。

title: Understanding Diffusion Models via Ratio-Based Function Approximation with SignReLU Networks
summary: Motivated by challenges in conditional generative modeling, where the target conditional density takes the form of a ratio f1 over f2, this paper develops a theoretical framework for approximating such ratio-type functionals. Here, f1 and f2 are kernel-based marginal densities that capture structured interactions, a setting central to diffusion-based generative models. We provide a concise proof for approximating these ratio-type functionals using deep neural networks with the SignReLU activation function, leveraging the activation's piecewise structure. Under standard regularity assumptions, we establish L^p(Omega) approximation bounds and convergence rates. Specializing to Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPMs), we construct a SignReLU-based neural estimator for the reverse process and derive bounds on the excess Kullback-Leibler (KL) risk between the generated and true data distributions. Our analysis decomposes this excess risk into approximation and estimation error components. These results provide generalization guarantees for finite-sample training of diffusion-based generative models.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于SignReLU激活函数的深度神经网络理论框架，用于近似条件生成建模中的比率型函数（f1/f2），并在扩散模型（如DDPM）中给出了逆向过程估计器及KL风险界，分解了泛化误差为逼近误差与估计误差。
AI.motivation: 针对条件生成建模中目标条件密度呈比率形式（f1/f2）的挑战，尤其在基于扩散的生成模型中该比率对应结构化边缘密度，亟需理论支撑。
AI.method: 利用SignReLU激活函数的分段结构特性，构建深度神经网络逼近比率型函数；在标准正则性假设下，推导L^p(Omega)逼近误差界与收敛速率；针对DDPM设计SignReLU神经估计器，并分析其KL风险分解。
AI.result: 获得了比率型函数的L^p逼近界与收敛率；为DDPM逆向过程构造了SignReLU估计器；导出了生成分布与真实分布间超额KL风险的上界，并将其分解为逼近误差和估计误差两部分。
AI.conclusion: 该理论框架为扩散类生成模型的有限样本训练提供了泛化保证，揭示了SignReLU网络在比率密度估计中的有效性与可分析性。

title: Conditional Generative Framework with Peak-Aware Attention for Robust Chemical Detection under Interferences
summary: Gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) is a widely used analytical method for chemical substance detection, but measurement reliability tends to deteriorate in the presence of interfering substances. In particular, interfering substances cause nonspecific peaks, residence time shifts, and increased background noise, resulting in reduced sensitivity and false alarms. To overcome these challenges, in this paper, we propose an artificial intelligence discrimination framework based on a peak-aware conditional generative model to improve the reliability of GC-MS measurements under interference conditions. The framework is learned with a novel peak-aware mechanism that highlights the characteristic peaks of GC-MS data, allowing it to generate important spectral features more faithfully. In addition, chemical and solvent information is encoded in a latent vector embedded with it, allowing a conditional generative adversarial neural network (CGAN) to generate a synthetic GC-MS signal consistent with the experimental conditions. This generates an experimental dataset that assumes indirect substance situations in chemical substance data, where acquisition is limited without conducting real experiments. These data are used for the learning of AI-based GC-MS discrimination models to help in accurate chemical substance discrimination. We conduct various quantitative and qualitative evaluations of the generated simulated data to verify the validity of the proposed framework. We also verify how the generative model improves the performance of the AI discrimination framework. Representatively, the proposed method is shown to consistently achieve cosine similarity and Pearson correlation coefficient values above 0.9 while preserving peak number diversity and reducing false alarms in the discrimination model.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于峰感知条件生成模型的人工智能判别框架，用于提升干扰条件下GC-MS检测的可靠性。该框架通过突出特征峰、融合化学与溶剂信息生成高质量合成数据，从而增强AI判别模型的准确性与鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: GC-MS在存在干扰物质时易出现非特异性峰、保留时间偏移和背景噪声增加，导致灵敏度下降和误报，亟需提升其在复杂环境下的测量可靠性。
AI.method: 提出峰感知条件生成对抗网络（CGAN），引入峰感知机制突出GC-MS特征峰，并将化学与溶剂信息编码至隐向量中，以生成符合实验条件的合成GC-MS信号；利用合成数据训练AI判别模型。
AI.result: 生成数据与真实数据在余弦相似度和皮尔逊相关系数上均超0.9，有效保持峰数量多样性并显著降低误报率。
AI.conclusion: 所提峰感知条件生成框架能高效生成高质量GC-MS仿真数据，显著提升AI判别模型在干扰条件下的准确性与稳定性，为有限实测场景下的化学物质识别提供新范式。

title: DUET: Distilled LLM Unlearning from an Efficiently Contextualized Teacher
summary: LLM unlearning is a technique to remove the impacts of undesirable knowledge from the model without retraining from scratch, which is indispensable towards trustworthy AI. Existing unlearning methods face significant limitations: conventional tuning-based unlearning is computationally heavy and prone to catastrophic forgetting. In contrast, in-contextualized unlearning is lightweight for precise unlearning but vulnerable to prompt removal or reverse engineering attacks. In response, we propose Distilled Unlearning from an Efficient Teacher (DUET), a novel distillation-based unlearning method that combines the merits of these two lines of work. It learns a student model to imitate the behavior of a prompt-steered teacher that effectively refuses undesirable knowledge generation while preserving general domain knowledge. Extensive evaluations on existing benchmarks with our enriched evaluation protocols demonstrate that DUET achieves higher performance in both forgetting and utility preservation, while being orders of magnitude more data-efficient than state-of-the-art unlearning methods.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为DUET的新型蒸馏式大模型遗忘方法，通过让学生模型模仿受提示引导的教师模型的行为，在高效实现特定知识遗忘的同时，保留通用领域知识，显著提升了遗忘效果与实用性，并大幅提高了数据效率。
AI.motivation: 现有大模型遗忘方法存在计算开销大、易灾难性遗忘（调优式）或易受提示移除/逆向工程攻击（上下文式）等问题，亟需兼顾安全性、效率与效果的新方法。
AI.method: 提出Distilled Unlearning from an Efficient Teacher (DUET)，采用知识蒸馏框架：以一个经提示引导、能拒绝生成不良知识但保持领域能力的教师模型为指导，训练学生模型模仿其行为，实现轻量、鲁棒的遗忘。
AI.result: 在多个基准和增强评估协议上，DUET在遗忘效果（forgetting）和效用保持（utility preservation）两方面均优于现有最先进方法，且数据效率提升数量级。
AI.conclusion: DUET成功融合调优式与上下文式遗忘的优势，为构建可信AI提供了一种高效、鲁棒、数据友好的大模型遗忘新范式。

title: PILD: Physics-Informed Learning via Diffusion
summary: Diffusion models have emerged as powerful generative tools for modeling complex data distributions, yet their purely data-driven nature limits applicability in practical engineering and scientific problems where physical laws need to be followed. This paper proposes Physics-Informed Learning via Diffusion (PILD), a framework that unifies diffusion modeling and first-principles physical constraints by introducing a virtual residual observation sampled from a Laplace distribution to supervise generation during training. To further integrate physical laws, a conditional embedding module is incorporated to inject physical information into the denoising network at multiple layers, ensuring consistent guidance throughout the diffusion process. The proposed PILD framework is concise, modular, and broadly applicable to problems governed by ordinary differential equations, partial differential equations, as well as algebraic equations or inequality constraints. Extensive experiments across engineering and scientific tasks including estimating vehicle trajectories, tire forces, Darcy flow and plasma dynamics, demonstrate that our PILD substantially improves accuracy, stability, and generalization over existing physics-informed and diffusion-based baselines.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为PILD的物理信息扩散模型框架，通过引入拉普拉斯分布的虚拟残差观测和多层物理条件嵌入模块，在扩散过程中融合物理定律，显著提升了生成结果的准确性、稳定性和泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 扩散模型虽强大但纯数据驱动，难以满足需遵循物理定律的工程与科学实际问题。
AI.method: 提出Physics-Informed Learning via Diffusion（PILD）框架：1）引入拉普拉斯分布采样的虚拟残差观测监督训练；2）设计条件嵌入模块，在去噪网络多层注入物理信息。
AI.result: 在车辆轨迹估计、轮胎力预测、达西流与等离子体动力学等多个任务上，PILD显著优于现有物理信息与扩散模型基线，提升精度、稳定性与泛化性。
AI.conclusion: PILD是一种简洁、模块化且广泛适用的框架，可有效融合扩散建模与第一性原理物理约束，适用于含常微分方程、偏微分方程及代数/不等式约束的问题。

title: Zenith: Scaling up Ranking Models for Billion-scale Livestreaming Recommendation
summary: Accurately capturing feature interactions is essential in recommender systems, and recent trends show that scaling up model capacity could be a key driver for next-level predictive performance. While prior work has explored various model architectures to capture multi-granularity feature interactions, relatively little attention has been paid to efficient feature handling and scaling model capacity without incurring excessive inference latency. In this paper, we address this by presenting Zenith, a scalable and efficient ranking architecture that learns complex feature interactions with minimal runtime overhead. Zenith is designed to handle a few high-dimensional Prime Tokens with Token Fusion and Token Boost modules, which exhibits superior scaling laws compared to other state-of-the-art ranking methods, thanks to its improved token heterogeneity. Its real-world effectiveness is demonstrated by deploying the architecture to TikTok Live, a leading online livestreaming platform that attracts billions of users globally. Our A/B test shows that Zenith achieves +1.05%/-1.10% in online CTR AUC and Logloss, and realizes +9.93% gains in Quality Watch Session / User and +8.11% in Quality Watch Duration / User.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了Zenith，一种可扩展且高效的推荐系统排序架构，通过Token Fusion和Token Boost模块处理高维Prime Tokens，在保持低推理延迟的同时提升特征交互建模能力，并在TikTok Live上验证了其显著的线上效果。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在建模多粒度特征交互时，往往忽视了高效特征处理与模型容量扩展之间的平衡，导致推理延迟过高，难以满足实际大规模推荐场景需求。
AI.method: 提出Zenith架构，包含Token Fusion和Token Boost模块，专门处理少量高维Prime Tokens，增强token异质性以改善缩放规律。
AI.result: 在TikTok Live上线A/B测试中，Zenith提升CTR AUC达+1.05%，Logloss降低1.10%，优质观看会话/用户提升9.93%，优质观看时长/用户提升8.11%。
AI.conclusion: Zenith在不显著增加推理开销的前提下，实现了更优的特征交互建模与线上指标提升，验证了其作为高效可扩展排序架构的有效性与实用性。

title: Physics-Guided Tiny-Mamba Transformer for Reliability-Aware Early Fault Warning
comment: Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Reliability
summary: Reliability-centered prognostics for rotating machinery requires early warning signals that remain accurate under nonstationary operating conditions, domain shifts across speed/load/sensors, and severe class imbalance, while keeping the false-alarm rate small and predictable. We propose the Physics-Guided Tiny-Mamba Transformer (PG-TMT), a compact tri-branch encoder tailored for online condition monitoring. A depthwise-separable convolutional stem captures micro-transients, a Tiny-Mamba state-space branch models near-linear long-range dynamics, and a lightweight local Transformer encodes cross-channel resonances. We derive an analytic temporal-to-spectral mapping that ties the model's attention spectrum to classical bearing fault-order bands, yielding a band-alignment score that quantifies physical plausibility and provides physics-grounded explanations. To ensure decision reliability, healthy-score exceedances are modeled with extreme-value theory (EVT), which yields an on-threshold achieving a target false-alarm intensity (events/hour); a dual-threshold hysteresis with a minimum hold time further suppresses chatter. Under a leakage-free streaming protocol with right-censoring of missed detections on CWRU, Paderborn, XJTU-SY, and an industrial pilot, PG-TMT attains higher precision-recall AUC (primary under imbalance), competitive or better ROC AUC, and shorter mean time-to-detect at matched false-alarm intensity, together with strong cross-domain transfer. By coupling physics-aligned representations with EVT-calibrated decision rules, PG-TMT delivers calibrated, interpretable, and deployment-ready early warnings for reliability-centric prognostics and health management.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Physics-Guided Tiny-Mamba Transformer（PG-TMT）的紧凑型三支路编码器模型，用于旋转机械的可靠性中心化预测与健康管理。该模型融合物理先验（如故障阶次带对齐）与数据驱动建模（Tiny-Mamba + 轻量Transformer），并结合极值理论（EVT）校准告警阈值，以在非平稳工况、跨域迁移和严重类别不平衡下实现高精度、低且可控误报率的在线早期故障预警。
AI.motivation: 旋转机械的可靠性中心化预测需在非平稳运行条件、跨工况/传感器域偏移及严重类别不平衡下，提供准确、低且可预测误报率的早期预警信号。
AI.method: 提出PG-TMT三支路编码器：1）深度可分离卷积主干捕获微瞬态；2）Tiny-Mamba状态空间分支建模近线性长程动态；3）轻量局部Transformer编码跨通道共振。引入解析时-频映射，将注意力谱与轴承故障阶次带对齐，生成物理可解释的带对齐分数；采用极值理论（EVT）建模健康分超限，设定目标误报强度的阈值，并辅以双阈值迟滞机制抑制抖动。
AI.result: 在CWRU、Paderborn、XJTU-SY及工业试点数据集上，PG-TMT在泄漏无损流式协议下取得更高Precision-Recall AUC（不平衡场景主指标）、相当或更优ROC AUC、更短平均检测时间（匹配误报强度下），并具备强跨域泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: PG-TMT通过物理对齐表征与EVT校准决策规则相结合，实现了可校准、可解释、即插即用的早期预警系统，适用于可靠性导向的预测性维护与健康管理。

title: Grounding and Enhancing Informativeness and Utility in Dataset Distillation
comment: Accepted by ICLR 2026, 20 pages, 9 figures, 11 tables
summary: Dataset Distillation (DD) seeks to create a compact dataset from a large, real-world dataset. While recent methods often rely on heuristic approaches to balance efficiency and quality, the fundamental relationship between original and synthetic data remains underexplored. This paper revisits knowledge distillation-based dataset distillation within a solid theoretical framework. We introduce the concepts of Informativeness and Utility, capturing crucial information within a sample and essential samples in the training set, respectively. Building on these principles, we define optimal dataset distillation mathematically. We then present InfoUtil, a framework that balances informativeness and utility in synthesizing the distilled dataset. InfoUtil incorporates two key components: (1) game-theoretic informativeness maximization using Shapley Value attribution to extract key information from samples, and (2) principled utility maximization by selecting globally influential samples based on Gradient Norm. These components ensure that the distilled dataset is both informative and utility-optimized. Experiments demonstrate that our method achieves a 6.1\% performance improvement over the previous state-of-the-art approach on ImageNet-1K dataset using ResNet-18.

AI.tldr: 本文提出InfoUtil框架，通过信息量（Informativeness）和效用（Utility）的理论建模与优化，实现更优的数据集蒸馏，在ImageNet-1K上超越SOTA 6.1%。
AI.motivation: 现有数据集蒸馏方法多依赖启发式策略，缺乏对原始数据与合成数据间根本关系的理论刻画。
AI.method: 定义Informativeness（样本内关键信息）与Utility（训练集中关键样本），构建最优蒸馏的数学形式；提出InfoUtil框架：①基于Shapley值的信息量最大化（博弈论视角），②基于梯度范数的效用最大化（选择全局影响大的样本）。
AI.result: 在ImageNet-1K数据集上使用ResNet-18，性能比此前SOTA提升6.1%。
AI.conclusion: 从信息与效用双维度建模数据集蒸馏具有理论合理性与实践优越性，InfoUtil为DD提供了可解释、可优化的新范式。

title: The Surprising Difficulty of Search in Model-Based Reinforcement Learning
summary: This paper investigates search in model-based reinforcement learning (RL). Conventional wisdom holds that long-term predictions and compounding errors are the primary obstacles for model-based RL. We challenge this view, showing that search is not a plug-and-play replacement for a learned policy. Surprisingly, we find that search can harm performance even when the model is highly accurate. Instead, we show that mitigating distribution shift matters more than improving model or value function accuracy. Building on this insight, we identify key techniques for enabling effective search, achieving state-of-the-art performance across multiple popular benchmark domains.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了模型强化学习中搜索即插即用的传统观点，指出即使模型高度准确，搜索也可能损害性能；关键在于缓解分布偏移，而非提升模型或价值函数的准确性，并据此提出关键技术实现多基准领域的最先进性能。
AI.motivation: 传统观点认为长期预测和误差累积是模型强化学习的主要障碍，本文旨在挑战这一观点，并探究搜索在模型强化学习中的真实作用与限制。
AI.method: 通过实验分析搜索在模型强化学习中的影响，识别导致性能下降的关键因素（如分布偏移），并基于此提出改进搜索有效性的关键技术。
AI.result: 发现搜索并非即插即用，甚至在模型高度准确时仍可能损害性能；缓解分布偏移比提高模型或价值函数精度更重要；所提方法在多个主流基准领域达到最先进性能。
AI.conclusion: 搜索的有效性取决于对分布偏移的控制，而非单纯依赖模型精度；应重新审视搜索在模型强化学习中的角色，并聚焦于分布匹配等核心问题。

title: Distributionally Robust Classification for Multi-source Unsupervised Domain Adaptation
summary: Unsupervised domain adaptation (UDA) is a statistical learning problem when the distribution of training (source) data is different from that of test (target) data. In this setting, one has access to labeled data only from the source domain and unlabeled data from the target domain. The central objective is to leverage the source data and the unlabeled target data to build models that generalize to the target domain. Despite its potential, existing UDA approaches often struggle in practice, particularly in scenarios where the target domain offers only limited unlabeled data or spurious correlations dominate the source domain. To address these challenges, we propose a novel distributionally robust learning framework that models uncertainty in both the covariate distribution and the conditional label distribution. Our approach is motivated by the multi-source domain adaptation setting but is also directly applicable to the single-source scenario, making it versatile in practice. We develop an efficient learning algorithm that can be seamlessly integrated with existing UDA methods. Extensive experiments under various distribution shift scenarios show that our method consistently outperforms strong baselines, especially when target data are extremely scarce.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的分布鲁棒学习框架，用于解决无监督域自适应（UDA）中目标域数据稀缺和源域存在虚假相关性的问题，通过建模协变量分布与条件标签分布的不确定性，提升模型在目标域上的泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 现有UDA方法在目标域标注数据极少或源域存在强虚假相关性时表现不佳，亟需更鲁棒的方法。
AI.method: 提出一种分布鲁棒学习框架，同时建模协变量分布和条件标签分布的不确定性；设计可与现有UDA方法无缝集成的高效学习算法。
AI.result: 在多种分布偏移场景下的大量实验表明，该方法显著优于强基线，尤其在目标数据极度稀缺时优势明显。
AI.conclusion: 所提框架兼具理论合理性与实践通用性，适用于单源与多源UDA场景，有效提升了UDA在现实受限条件下的鲁棒性与实用性。

title: Heterogeneous Vertiport Selection Optimization for On-Demand Air Taxi Services: A Deep Reinforcement Learning Approach
summary: Urban Air Mobility (UAM) has emerged as a transformative solution to alleviate urban congestion by utilizing low-altitude airspace, thereby reducing pressure on ground transportation networks. To enable truly efficient and seamless door-to-door travel experiences, UAM requires close integration with existing ground transportation infrastructure. However, current research on optimal integrated routing strategies for passengers in air-ground mobility systems remains limited, with a lack of systematic exploration.To address this gap, we first propose a unified optimization model that integrates strategy selection for both air and ground transportation. This model captures the dynamic characteristics of multimodal transport networks and incorporates real-time traffic conditions alongside passenger decision-making behavior. Building on this model, we propose a Unified Air-Ground Mobility Coordination (UAGMC) framework, which leverages deep reinforcement learning (RL) and Vehicle-to-Everything (V2X) communication to optimize vertiport selection and dynamically plan air taxi routes. Experimental results demonstrate that UAGMC achieves a 34\% reduction in average travel time compared to conventional proportional allocation methods, enhancing overall travel efficiency and providing novel insights into the integration and optimization of multimodal transportation systems. This work lays a solid foundation for advancing intelligent urban mobility solutions through the coordination of air and ground transportation modes. The related code can be found at https://github.com/Traffic-Alpha/UAGMC.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种统一的空地交通协同优化模型与框架（UAGMC），结合深度强化学习与V2X通信，实现动态垂直起降机场选择与空中出租车路径规划，显著降低平均出行时间。
AI.motivation: 现有研究缺乏对空地一体化出行系统中乘客最优路径规划的系统性探索，亟需整合低空UAM与地面交通以实现高效门到门出行。
AI.method: 构建统一优化模型，融合空地交通策略选择，刻画多模态网络动态特性与实时交通及乘客行为；在此基础上设计基于深度强化学习和V2X通信的UAGMC框架，用于动态优化vertiport选择与空中路径。
AI.result: 实验表明UAGMC相较传统比例分配方法可降低34%的平均出行时间，提升了整体出行效率。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为通过空地交通协同推动智能城市出行提供了坚实基础，并为多模态交通系统集成优化提供了新思路。

title: Memorization Control in Diffusion Models from Denoising-centric Perspective
summary: Controlling memorization in diffusion models is critical for applications that require generated data to closely match the training distribution. Existing approaches mainly focus on data centric or model centric modifications, treating the diffusion model as an isolated predictor. In this paper, we study memorization in diffusion models from a denoising centric perspective. We show that uniform timestep sampling leads to unequal learning contributions across denoising steps due to differences in signal to noise ratio, which biases training toward memorization. To address this, we propose a timestep sampling strategy that explicitly controls where learning occurs along the denoising trajectory. By adjusting the width of the confidence interval, our method provides direct control over the memorization generalization trade off. Experiments on image and 1D signal generation tasks demonstrate that shifting learning emphasis toward later denoising steps consistently reduces memorization and improves distributional alignment with training data, validating the generality and effectiveness of our approach.

AI.tldr: 本文从去噪中心视角研究扩散模型中的记忆化问题，提出一种新的时间步采样策略，通过调整置信区间宽度直接控制记忆化与泛化之间的权衡，实验证明该方法能有效减少记忆化并提升生成数据与训练分布的一致性。
AI.motivation: 控制扩散模型的记忆化对需要生成数据紧密匹配训练分布的应用至关重要；现有方法主要关注数据或模型层面的修改，而忽略了去噪过程本身的影响。
AI.method: 提出一种基于去噪轨迹的时间步采样策略，通过调节置信区间宽度，显式控制学习发生在去噪过程的哪个阶段。
AI.result: 在图像和1D信号生成任务上的实验表明，将学习重点向后期去噪步骤偏移可一致地减少记忆化，并提升生成分布与训练分布的对齐程度。
AI.conclusion: 去噪过程中的时间步采样策略对记忆化具有显著影响，所提方法提供了一种通用且有效的记忆化-泛化权衡调控机制。

title: L2R: Low-Rank and Lipschitz-Controlled Routing for Mixture-of-Experts
summary: Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) models scale neural networks by conditionally activating a small subset of experts, where the router plays a central role in determining expert specialization and overall model performance. However, many modern MoE systems still adopt linear routers in raw high-dimensional representation spaces, where representation mismatch, angular concentration, and scale-sensitive scoring can jointly undermine routing discriminability and stable expert specialization. In this work, we propose Low-rank \& Lipschitz-controlled Routing (L2R), a unified routing framework that reshapes both the routing space and scoring geometry. L2R performs expert assignment in a shared low-rank latent routing space and introduces Saturated Inner-Product Scoring (SIPS) to explicitly control the Lipschitz behavior of routing functions, yielding smoother and more stable routing geometry. In addition, L2R incorporates a parameter-efficient multi-anchor routing mechanism to enhance expert expressiveness. Extensive experiments on a large-scale language MoE model and a vision MoE setting on ImageNet demonstrate that L2R consistently improves routing stability, expert specialization, and overall model performance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为L2R的新型路由框架，通过低秩潜在空间和饱和内积评分（SIPS）来提升MoE模型中路由器的判别力与稳定性，并增强专家表达能力，在语言和视觉任务上均取得性能提升。
AI.motivation: 现有MoE模型多采用原始高维空间中的线性路由器，易受表征失配、角度集中和尺度敏感打分等问题影响，导致路由判别力弱、专家专业化不稳定。
AI.method: 提出低秩与Lipschitz约束路由（L2R）：（1）将专家分配映射到共享低秩潜在路由空间；（2）引入饱和内积评分（SIPS）显式控制路由函数的Lipschitz性质；（3）设计参数高效的多锚点路由机制以提升专家表达能力。
AI.result: 在大规模语言MoE模型和ImageNet上的视觉MoE设置中，L2R显著提升了路由稳定性、专家专业化程度及整体模型性能。
AI.conclusion: L2R通过协同优化路由空间结构与打分几何，为MoE模型提供了更鲁棒、可扩展且高效的路由范式。

title: Theoretically Optimal Attention/FFN Ratios in Disaggregated LLM Serving
summary: Attention-FFN disaggregation (AFD) is an emerging architecture for LLM decoding that separates state-heavy, KV-cache-dominated Attention computation from stateless, compute-intensive FFN computation, connected by per-step communication. While AFD enables independent scaling of memory and compute resources, its performance is highly sensitive to the Attention/FFN provisioning ratio: mis-sizing induces step-level blocking and costly device idle time. We develop a tractable analytical framework for sizing AFD bundles in an $r$A-$1$F topology, where the key difficulty is that Attention-side work is nonstationary-token context grows and requests are continuously replenished with random lengths-while FFN work is stable given the aggregated batch. Using a probabilistic workload model, we derive closed-form rules for the optimal A/F ratio that maximize average throughput per instance across the system. A trace-calibrated AFD simulator validates the theory: across workloads, the theoretical optimal A/F ratio matches the simulation-optimal within 10%, and consistently reduces idle time.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种针对LLM解码的注意力-前馈网络分离（AFD）架构的资源配比分析框架，通过概率工作负载建模，推导出最优Attention/FFN资源配置比，显著降低设备空闲时间并提升吞吐量。
AI.motivation: AFD架构虽能独立扩展内存与计算资源，但其性能对Attention/FFN的资源配置比高度敏感；错误配比会导致步级阻塞和设备空闲，亟需理论指导进行合理定容。
AI.method: 构建适用于rA-1F拓扑的可处理解析框架，采用概率工作负载模型刻画非平稳的Attention端任务（受动态上下文长度和随机请求长度影响）与稳定的FFN端任务，进而推导最大化系统平均吞吐量的最优A/F比闭式规则。
AI.result: 所提闭式规则在多种负载下与仿真结果误差<10%，且一致减少设备空闲时间；经真实trace校准的AFD模拟器验证了该理论的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 基于非平稳-平稳混合负载建模的解析方法，为AFD等异构计算架构提供了高效、可泛化的资源定容理论基础。

title: Sim-MSTNet: sim2real based Multi-task SpatioTemporal Network Traffic Forecasting
summary: Network traffic forecasting plays a crucial role in intelligent network operations, but existing techniques often perform poorly when faced with limited data. Additionally, multi-task learning methods struggle with task imbalance and negative transfer, especially when modeling various service types. To overcome these challenges, we propose Sim-MSTNet, a multi-task spatiotemporal network traffic forecasting model based on the sim2real approach. Our method leverages a simulator to generate synthetic data, effectively addressing the issue of poor generalization caused by data scarcity. By employing a domain randomization technique, we reduce the distributional gap between synthetic and real data through bi-level optimization of both sample weighting and model training. Moreover, Sim-MSTNet incorporates attention-based mechanisms to selectively share knowledge between tasks and applies dynamic loss weighting to balance task objectives. Extensive experiments on two open-source datasets show that Sim-MSTNet consistently outperforms state-of-the-art baselines, achieving enhanced accuracy and generalization.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Sim-MSTNet，一种基于sim2real的多任务时空网络流量预测模型，通过仿真器生成合成数据、域随机化缩小仿真与真实数据分布差异，并结合注意力机制和动态损失加权缓解任务不平衡与负迁移问题。
AI.motivation: 现有网络流量预测方法在数据稀缺时泛化能力差；多任务学习易受任务不平衡和负迁移影响，尤其在建模多种服务类型时。
AI.method: 提出Sim-MSTNet：1）利用仿真器生成合成数据缓解数据稀缺；2）采用域随机化与双层优化（样本加权+模型训练）缩小仿真-真实数据分布差距；3）引入注意力机制实现任务间选择性知识共享；4）使用动态损失加权平衡多任务目标。
AI.result: 在两个开源数据集上的实验表明，Sim-MSTNet持续优于SOTA基线，精度和泛化能力均提升。
AI.conclusion: Sim-MSTNet有效解决了小样本下多任务网络流量预测中的泛化差、任务不平衡与负迁移问题，验证了sim2real范式在该领域的有效性。

title: Intrinsic Reward Policy Optimization for Sparse-Reward Environments
summary: Exploration is essential in reinforcement learning as an agent relies on trial and error to learn an optimal policy. However, when rewards are sparse, naive exploration strategies, like noise injection, are often insufficient. Intrinsic rewards can also provide principled guidance for exploration by, for example, combining them with extrinsic rewards to optimize a policy or using them to train subpolicies for hierarchical learning. However, the former approach suffers from unstable credit assignment, while the latter exhibits sample inefficiency and sub-optimality. We propose a policy optimization framework that leverages multiple intrinsic rewards to directly optimize a policy for an extrinsic reward without pretraining subpolicies. Our algorithm -- intrinsic reward policy optimization (IRPO) -- achieves this by using a surrogate policy gradient that provides a more informative learning signal than the true gradient in sparse-reward environments. We demonstrate that IRPO improves performance and sample efficiency relative to baselines in discrete and continuous environments, and formally analyze the optimization problem solved by IRPO. Our code is available at https://github.com/Mgineer117/IRPO.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为内在奖励策略优化（IRPO）的新框架，通过利用多种内在奖励直接优化外部奖励策略，无需预训练子策略，在稀疏奖励环境中提升了性能和样本效率。
AI.motivation: 在稀疏奖励环境下，传统探索策略（如噪声注入）效果有限；结合内在奖励的方法存在信用分配不稳定或样本效率低、次优等问题。
AI.method: 提出IRPO算法，采用代理策略梯度（surrogate policy gradient）作为更有效的学习信号，直接基于多种内在奖励优化外部奖励策略，避免预训练子策略。
AI.result: 在离散与连续环境中，IRPO相较基线方法展现出更好的性能和样本效率，并对所解优化问题进行了形式化分析。
AI.conclusion: IRPO为稀疏奖励强化学习提供了一种稳定、高效且无需分层预训练的内在奖励利用新范式。

title: Mitigating Overthinking in Large Reasoning Models via Difficulty-aware Reinforcement Learning
summary: Large Reasoning Models (LRMs) achieve explicit chain-of-thought expansion by imitating deep thinking behaviors of humans, demonstrating excellent performance in complex task scenarios. However, the deep-thinking mode often leads to unnecessarily lengthy reasoning and resource inefficiency when handling simple tasks. This overthinking phenomenon may arise from the generation preference triggered by the reward function during post-training. Existing research attempts to mitigate overthinking from the perspective of prompt design or model training, but generally underestimates the importance of task difficulty awareness, which makes it difficult for LRMs to effectively allocate reasoning resources. In this paper, we propose Difficulty-aware Policy Optimization (DiPO), a reinforcement learning-based LRM training framework. DiPO encourages LRM to spontaneously model task complexity, and integrates them into reinforcement learning framework to adjust the generation preferences introduced by post-training. A difficulty modeling method based on model self-reasoning is proposed, which significantly reduces the dependence on manual annotation and formalize task complexity. We further develop a difficulty-signal-enhanced reward function that incorporates a penalty for lengthy reasoning while considering reasoning performance and output format. Experimental results indicate that DiPO enables the model to spontaneously adjust inference overhead, significantly reducing redundant tokens without losing performance due to thought compression.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Difficulty-aware Policy Optimization (DiPO)，一种基于强化学习的大型推理模型（LRM）训练框架，旨在缓解LRM在简单任务上的'过度思考'问题。DiPO通过让模型自主建模任务难度，并设计难度感知的奖励函数，在减少冗余推理的同时保持性能。
AI.motivation: 大型推理模型（LRMs）在简单任务中因模仿人类深度思考而产生冗余推理（即'过度思考'），现有方法忽视了任务难度感知，难以实现推理资源的有效分配。
AI.method: 提出Difficulty-aware Policy Optimization (DiPO)框架：1）基于模型自推理的难度建模方法，降低人工标注依赖；2）设计难度信号增强的奖励函数，兼顾推理性能、输出格式并惩罚冗长推理。
AI.result: 实验表明，DiPO使模型能自发调节推理开销，显著减少冗余token，且未因思维压缩而损失性能。
AI.conclusion: 任务难度感知对优化LRM推理效率至关重要；DiPO提供了一种无需大量人工标注、兼顾效率与性能的强化学习训练新范式。

title: SAGE: Sequence-level Adaptive Gradient Evolution for Generative Recommendation
comment: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2506.19235
summary: While works such as OneRec have validated the scaling laws of Large Language Models (LLMs) in recommender systems, they rely on a cumbersome separate vocabulary. This dependency prevents the model architecture from reusing native LLM vocabularies, resulting in high maintenance costs and poor scalability. In response, we aim to efficiently reuse open-source LLM architectures without constructing a separate tokenization vocabulary. Furthermore, we identify that the optimization strategy of OneRec Gradient Bounded Policy Optimization (GBPO),suffers from a "Symmetric Conservatism" problem: its static gradient boundaries structurally suppress the update momentum required for cold-start items and fail to prevent diversity collapse in high-noise environments.To address this issue, we propose SAGE (Sequence-level Adaptive Gradient Evolution), a unified optimization framework tailored for list-wise generative recommendation. SAGE introduces two key innovations:(1) Sequence-level Signal Decoupling: By combining a geometric mean importance ratio with decoupled multi-objective advantages, we eliminate token-level variance and resolve the "Reward Collapse" problem. (2) Asymmetric Adaptive Dynamics: We construct a dynamic gradient manifold that applies a "Boost Factor" to high-potential cold start items to achieve super-linear updates and employs an "Entropy Aware Penalty" to break information cocoons. Theoretical analysis and empirical results demonstrate that SAGE effectively unblocks cold-start traffic and sustains recommendation diversity, all while retaining the numerical stability of GBPO.

AI.tldr: 本文提出SAGE框架，通过序列级信号解耦和非对称自适应动力学，解决OneRec中词汇独立及梯度优化的对称保守性问题，提升冷启动推荐效果与多样性。
AI.motivation: 现有基于大语言模型的推荐系统（如OneRec）依赖独立词表，维护成本高、扩展性差；其优化方法GBPO存在‘对称保守性’问题，难以兼顾冷启动项更新与噪声环境下的多样性保持。
AI.method: 提出SAGE（Sequence-level Adaptive Gradient Evolution）统一优化框架：（1）序列级信号解耦——结合几何平均重要性比与解耦多目标优势，消除token级方差；（2）非对称自适应动力学——构建动态梯度流形，对冷启动项施加‘提升因子’实现超线性更新，并引入‘熵感知惩罚’打破信息茧房。
AI.result: 理论分析与实验表明，SAGE能有效缓解冷启动问题、维持推荐多样性，同时保留GBPO的数值稳定性。
AI.conclusion: SAGE实现了无需独立词表的开源LLM架构复用，并通过创新的梯度调控机制，在生成式列表推荐中兼顾性能、稳定性和泛化能力。

title: HER: Human-like Reasoning and Reinforcement Learning for LLM Role-playing
summary: LLM role-playing, i.e., using LLMs to simulate specific personas, has emerged as a key capability in various applications, such as companionship, content creation, and digital games. While current models effectively capture character tones and knowledge, simulating the inner thoughts behind their behaviors remains a challenge. Towards cognitive simulation in LLM role-play, previous efforts mainly suffer from two deficiencies: data with high-quality reasoning traces, and reliable reward signals aligned with human preferences. In this paper, we propose HER, a unified framework for cognitive-level persona simulation. HER introduces dual-layer thinking, which distinguishes characters' first-person thinking from LLMs' third-person thinking. To bridge these gaps, we curate reasoning-augmented role-playing data via reverse engineering and construct human-aligned principles and reward models. Leveraging these resources, we train \method models based on Qwen3-32B via supervised and reinforcement learning. Extensive experiments validate the effectiveness of our approach. Notably, our models significantly outperform the Qwen3-32B baseline, achieving a 30.26 improvement on the CoSER benchmark and a 14.97 gain on the Minimax Role-Play Bench. Our datasets, principles, and models will be released to facilitate future research.

AI.tldr: 本文提出HER框架，通过双层思维建模（角色第一人称思考 vs. LLM第三人称推理）、逆向工程构建高质量推理数据、以及基于人类偏好的奖励建模，显著提升了大模型在角色扮演中对内在认知过程的模拟能力。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM角色扮演虽能模仿语气与知识，但难以真实模拟角色的‘内在思想’；其瓶颈在于缺乏高质量推理轨迹数据和符合人类偏好的可靠奖励信号。
AI.method: 提出HER统一框架：1）引入双层思考机制区分角色内省与模型推理；2）通过逆向工程构建推理增强型角色扮演数据；3）设计人类对齐的原则体系与奖励模型；4）在Qwen3-32B上联合使用监督学习与强化学习进行训练。
AI.result: 在CoSER基准提升30.26，在Minimax Role-Play Bench提升14.97，显著超越Qwen3-32B基线；并开源数据集、原则与模型。
AI.conclusion: HER有效推动了LLM从行为表征迈向认知模拟，为可信赖、有深度的角色扮演提供了新范式与基础资源。

title: L$^3$: Large Lookup Layers
summary: Modern sparse language models typically achieve sparsity through Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) layers, which dynamically route tokens to dense MLP "experts." However, dynamic hard routing has a number of drawbacks, such as potentially poor hardware efficiency and needing auxiliary losses for stable training. In contrast, the tokenizer embedding table, which is natively sparse, largely avoids these issues by selecting a single embedding per token at the cost of not having contextual information. In this work, we introduce the Large Lookup Layer (L$^3$), which unlocks a new axis of sparsity by generalizing embedding tables to model decoder layers. L$^3$ layers use static token-based routing to aggregate a set of learned embeddings per token in a context-dependent way, allowing the model to efficiently balance memory and compute by caching information in embeddings. L$^3$ has two main components: (1) a systems-friendly architecture that allows for fast training and CPU-offloaded inference with no overhead, and (2) an information-theoretic embedding allocation algorithm that effectively balances speed and quality. We empirically test L$^3$ by training transformers with up to 2.6B active parameters and find that L$^3$ strongly outperforms both dense models and iso-sparse MoEs in both language modeling and downstream tasks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新型稀疏化方法Large Lookup Layer（L³），通过静态token路由和上下文相关的嵌入聚合，在解码层中引入新的稀疏维度，兼顾硬件效率与建模能力，并在语言建模和下游任务中显著优于密集模型和等稀疏MoE模型。
AI.motivation: 现有MoE动态硬路由存在硬件效率低、训练不稳定等问题；而传统词嵌入表虽天然稀疏但缺乏上下文信息。本文旨在探索一种兼具高效性与上下文建模能力的新稀疏范式。
AI.method: 提出Large Lookup Layer（L³），包含两部分：(1) 系统友好的静态token路由架构，支持快速训练与CPU卸载推理；(2) 基于信息论的嵌入分配算法，优化速度与质量权衡。
AI.result: 在高达2.6B活跃参数的Transformer上验证，L³在语言建模和下游任务中均显著优于同规模密集模型和等稀疏MoE模型。
AI.conclusion: L³为稀疏语言模型提供了一种新范式，在保持高硬件效率的同时增强上下文建模能力，是嵌入表思想向解码层的有效泛化。

title: More Bang for the Buck: Improving the Inference of Large Language Models at a Fixed Budget using Reset and Discard (ReD)
summary: The performance of large language models (LLMs) on verifiable tasks is usually measured by pass@k, the probability of answering a question correctly at least once in k trials. At a fixed budget, a more suitable metric is coverage@cost, the average number of unique questions answered as a function of the total number of attempts. We connect the two metrics and show that the empirically-observed power-law behavior in pass@k leads to a sublinear growth of the coverage@cost (diminishing returns). To solve this problem, we propose Reset-and-Discard (ReD), a query method of LLMs that increases coverage@cost for any given budget, regardless of the pass@k form. Moreover, given a pass@k, we can quantitatively predict the savings in the total number of attempts using ReD. If pass@k is not available for the model, ReD can infer its power-law exponent. Experiments on three LLMs using HumanEval demonstrate that ReD substantially reduces the required attempts, tokens, and USD cost to reach a desired coverage, while also offering an efficient way to measure inference power-laws.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的LLM查询方法Reset-and-Discard（ReD），以提升在固定预算下的coverage@cost（单位成本覆盖问题数），并能基于pass@k预测节省的尝试次数或推断其幂律指数。
AI.motivation: 现有评估指标pass@k在固定预算下无法有效反映LLM对多样问题的实际覆盖能力；需要更合适的指标coverage@cost及相应优化方法。
AI.method: 提出Reset-and-Discard（ReD）查询策略，通过重置与丢弃机制提升coverage@cost，并支持从pass@k定量预测成本节省或反推幂律指数。
AI.result: 在HumanEval上实验表明，ReD显著减少了达成目标coverage所需的尝试次数、token量和美元成本，并可高效估计模型推理的幂律特性。
AI.conclusion: ReD是一种通用、高效且可预测的LLM查询优化方法，提升了单位成本下的问题覆盖效率，并为LLM推理能力量化分析提供了新工具。

title: Multi-Modal Time Series Prediction via Mixture of Modulated Experts
summary: Real-world time series exhibit complex and evolving dynamics, making accurate forecasting extremely challenging.
